name: Pig Escape
description:
Collect fruits to feed your pig.

The pig is tired of living on the farm. She wants new discoveries and new acquaintances. The pig decided to move to live in the city. This is its task.

Help the pig to get to the city, but do not forget, she loves to eat sooo much.

Control
A / D -> Move left and right
ESC -> Pause

New level = New location

You can download some of the textures of the pig at this link: https://buterbrodxd.itch.io/pig-sprite

Good luck and thanks for playing my games!
